channel.title: #171: Nick Franklin, founder of ChartMogul
channel.description:
Nick Franklin and I talked about what it is like to go down the venture capital route instead of bootstrapping.
For me this was a glimpse into another way of doing things.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/a27c8705-9c23-42eb-b58a-524e136f982d?dark=false"></iframe>
Nick and I discussed:
* why he used outside investment to create ChartMogul * ChartMogul's focus on creating good content * finding a steady stream of interesting things to write about * the difficulty of knowing how customers are acquired * getting pricing right
Nick on Twitter: [https://twitter.com/Nick_Franklin ](https://twitter.com/Nick_Franklin)
ChartMogul: https://chartmogul.com/
This [episode is also on YouTube](https://youtu.be/t5t-lBRRz28).
[You can also listen, subscribe, and download here](https://bootstrapped.fm/171-nick-franklin-founder-of-chartmogul/).
